_header: Saint Giles the holy man ne loved no sin
Subjects: saints’ lives; Giles, saint, life of
_description: Life of St. Giles in the South English Legendary — couplets

BodAsh43.First Lines:
Seyn gilis þe holi mon ne louede noþing sunneAt atteneis
                    he was ibore he com of kynges kunne…
BodAsh43.Last Lines:
…He deide seue hondred ȝer after þat god was
                    ibore& wende to þe Ioie of heuene þat he of seruede
                    byuore

Bod779.First Lines:
Seint gilis þe holyman ne loued noþing synneat attenes he
                    was I bore he com of kinges kinne…
Bod779.Last Lines:
…to þilke ioye he vs bring þat is wit outen
                    ende& graunt vs after oure ending daye þedir alle to
                    wende

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
SEint Gyles þe holy mon louede noþing sunneIn Athenes he
                    was ibore he com of kynges kunne…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…Now God for þe loue of seint Gyles his swete grace vs
                    sendeÞat we aftur þisse lyue to þe Ioye of heuene wende.
                    A.M.E.N.
BodEngPoeta1.Facsimiles:
Doyle,  I. A.,
                        ed.  
             The Vernon Manuscript. A Facsimile of Bodleian Library, Oxford, MS Eng.
                poet.a.1,
          with an introduction by A. I. Doyle. Cambridge: D. S. Brewer, 1987. 
Scase,  Wendy,  and  Nick Kennedy, eds.  
             A facsimile edition of the Vernon manuscript: Oxford, Bodleian Library, MS. Eng. Poet. A. 1.
         Oxford: The Bodleian Library, 2011.

BodLauMis463.First Lines:
SEint Giles þe confessour Loued noþing sinneAt attenes he
                    was y bore Comen of kinges kynne…
BodLauMis463.Last Lines:
…He diede seuene hondred ȝer after þat oure lord was
                    bore& went to þe ioye of heuene þat he deserued
                    bifore
BodLauMis463.Note: Two columns per page, one full-line, the other half-line

CamMagPep2344.First Lines:
Seint Gyle þe holy man ne louede no synneIn Attenes he was
                    ybore and ycome of heye kynne…
CamMagPep2344.Last Lines:
…He deyde sene hondred ȝer after þat god was
                    yboreAnd wente to þe ioye of heuene þat he aseruede by
                    ffore

CamTCC605.First Lines:
SEint gile þis holy man loued no þyng synneAtte attenes
                    he was ybore & ycome of kinges kunne…
CamTCC605.Last Lines:
…he deyed seuene hundred ȝere after þat god was
                    bore& wende to þe Ioie of heuene þat he serued by
                    fore

BLCottJulDIX.First Lines: SEyn gilis þe holiman ne loueþe noþing sinneat atteneis he was ibore he com of kyngis kunne…
BLCottJulDIX.Last Lines: …he deide seue hondreþ ȝer after þat god was i bore& wente to þe ioie of heuen þat he of serueþe bifore
BLCottJulDIX.Note: “Capitulum lix” added to left margin by later hand (f. 132v).

BLEge1993.First Lines: SEint Giles þe holi mon ne louede no sunneIn athenes he was ibore & com of kinges kunne…
BLEge1993.Last Lines: …He deiȝede seue hondred ȝer after þat god was boreAnd wende in to heuene as he deseruede bifore

BLHar2277.First Lines: SEint Giles þe confessour ne louede noþing synneAt Attenes he was ibore icome of kynges kynne…
BLHar2277.Last Lines: …He deide sone hondred ȝer after þat oure louerd was ibore& wende to þe ioye of heuene þat he of seruede bifore

TokyoTak54.First Lines:
Seynt Giles þe holy man loued noþing synneAt Athenys he
                    was bore and come of kynggis kynne…
TokyoTak54.Last Lines:
…He deied in þe vijC. ȝere aftere þat god was
                    boreAnd went to þe Ioye of heuene which he deserded tofore.
                    Amen.
